item.title: Katju to write tellall book about Indian judiciary
item.description: Former Supreme Court judge Markandey Katju said on Wednesday that he is writing a tellall book about the Indian judiciary which will offer solutions to the problems of corruption pendency and delayed justice plaguing the countrys legal system
item.itunes:subtitle: Former Supreme Court judge Markandey Katju said on Wednesday that he is writing a tellall book about the Indian judiciary which will offer solutions to the problems of corruption pendency and delayed justice plaguing the countrys legal system
item.itunes:summary: Former Supreme Court judge Markandey Katju said on Wednesday that he is writing a tellall book about the Indian judiciary which will offer solutions to the problems of corruption pendency and delayed justice plaguing the countrys legal system

item.title: KCR says no to Telangana Day kicks up storm
item.description: Telangana Chief Minister K Chandrasekhara Raos refusal to celebrate officially the Telangana Liberation Day on Wednesday has disappointed Telanganites and has also raised a storm in the state
item.itunes:subtitle: Telangana Chief Minister K Chandrasekhara Raos refusal to celebrate officially the Telangana Liberation Day on Wednesday has disappointed Telanganites and has also raised a storm in the state
item.itunes:summary: Telangana Chief Minister K Chandrasekhara Raos refusal to celebrate officially the Telangana Liberation Day on Wednesday has disappointed Telanganites and has also raised a storm in the state

item.title: Sushma to to be in New York for UNGA Modi visit
item.description: External affairs minister Sushma Swaraj will be with Prime Minister Narendra Modi during his visit to attend the 69th session of the United Nations general assembly in New York later this month
item.itunes:subtitle: External affairs minister Sushma Swaraj will be with Prime Minister Narendra Modi during his visit to attend the 69th session of the United Nations general assembly in New York later this month
item.itunes:summary: External affairs minister Sushma Swaraj will be with Prime Minister Narendra Modi during his visit to attend the 69th session of the United Nations general assembly in New York later this month

item.title: Migrant workers pay small fortunes to leave Srinagar
item.description: The fear of epidemic and loss of livelihoods witnessing migrant workers leave Srinagar in droves Jahangir Mohammad from Araria in Bihar waited for a free flight for two days outside the airport in the BSF relief camp but on Wednesday he booked a Spicejet flight to Chandigarh for Rs 2250
item.itunes:subtitle: The fear of epidemic and loss of livelihoods witnessing migrant workers leave Srinagar in droves Jahangir Mohammad from Araria in Bihar waited for a free flight for two days outside the airport in the BSF relief camp but on Wednesday he booked a Spicejet
item.itunes:summary: The fear of epidemic and loss of livelihoods witnessing migrant workers leave Srinagar in droves Jahangir Mohammad from Araria in Bihar waited for a free flight for two days outside the airport in the BSF relief camp but on Wednesday he booked a Spicejet flight to Chandigarh for Rs 2250

item.title: BJP top brass blamed for Uttar Pradesh loss
item.description: The 38 drubbing the BJP received at the hands of the Samajwadi Party in the UP bypolls exposed weak links in the saffron partys armour The infighting is out in the open as losing party candidates are busy preparing reports against party leaders and MPs whom they blame for their defeat
item.itunes:subtitle: The 38 drubbing the BJP received at the hands of the Samajwadi Party in the UP bypolls exposed weak links in the saffron partys armour The infighting is out in the open as losing party candidates are busy preparing reports against party leaders and MPs wh
item.itunes:summary: The 38 drubbing the BJP received at the hands of the Samajwadi Party in the UP bypolls exposed weak links in the saffron partys armour The infighting is out in the open as losing party candidates are busy preparing reports against party leaders and MPs whom they blame for their defeat

item.title: Bad times for BJP now mocks SPs Shiv Pal Yadav
item.description: Senior Uttar Pradesh cabinet minister and Samajwadi Party leader Shiv Pal Singh Yadav said on Wednesday that the bypoll results have exposed the Bharatiya Janata Partys communal agenda and false promises it made to the people before Lok Sabha polls
item.itunes:subtitle: Senior Uttar Pradesh cabinet minister and Samajwadi Party leader Shiv Pal Singh Yadav said on Wednesday that the bypoll results have exposed the Bharatiya Janata Partys communal agenda and false promises it made to the people before Lok Sabha polls
item.itunes:summary: Senior Uttar Pradesh cabinet minister and Samajwadi Party leader Shiv Pal Singh Yadav said on Wednesday that the bypoll results have exposed the Bharatiya Janata Partys communal agenda and false promises it made to the people before Lok Sabha polls

item.title: Chapter on Medha Patkar out of childrens book after govt letter
item.description: Governmentfunded publisher National Book Trustnbsphas decided to drop a chapter on Narmada Bachao Andolan activist and Aam Aadmi Party leader Medha Patkar from a book after an NGO raised an objection saying Patkar was a political person and therefore should not be included in the book
item.itunes:subtitle: Governmentfunded publisher National Book Trustnbsphas decided to drop a chapter on Narmada Bachao Andolan activist and Aam Aadmi Party leader Medha Patkar from a book after an NGO raised an objection saying Patkar was a political person and therefore shou
item.itunes:summary: Governmentfunded publisher National Book Trustnbsphas decided to drop a chapter on Narmada Bachao Andolan activist and Aam Aadmi Party leader Medha Patkar from a book after an NGO raised an objection saying Patkar was a political person and therefore should not be included in the book

item.title: Maneka wants bigger role for Varun in UP
item.description: A day after the BJPs disastrous performance in the Uttar Pradesh bypolls Women and Child Development WCD minister Maneka Gandhi quipped about her son Varun Gandhi to be brought back into the UP political scenario
item.itunes:subtitle: A day after the BJPs disastrous performance in the Uttar Pradesh bypolls Women and Child Development WCD minister Maneka Gandhi quipped about her son Varun Gandhi to be brought back into the UP political scenario
item.itunes:summary: A day after the BJPs disastrous performance in the Uttar Pradesh bypolls Women and Child Development WCD minister Maneka Gandhi quipped about her son Varun Gandhi to be brought back into the UP political scenario

item.title: PM to seek clarity on LAC positions raise trust issues
item.description: While the focus of IndiaChina talks during President Xi Jinpings visit remains the cementing of economic ties Prime Minister Narendra Modi is expected to also emphasise on trustbuilding and push for a clarification on the 3488km line of actual control LAC
item.itunes:subtitle: While the focus of IndiaChina talks during President Xi Jinpings visit remains the cementing of economic ties Prime Minister Narendra Modi is expected to also emphasise on trustbuilding and push for a clarification on the 3488km line of actual control LAC
item.itunes:summary: While the focus of IndiaChina talks during President Xi Jinpings visit remains the cementing of economic ties Prime Minister Narendra Modi is expected to also emphasise on trustbuilding and push for a clarification on the 3488km line of actual control LAC

item.title: 100 Chinese soldiers enter Chumar
item.description: On a day Chinese President Xi Jinping kicked off his threeday visit to the country the Chinese army reportedly made a fresh incursion in Chumar area and refused to return even as a flagmeeting between the two sides is believed to have made no headway in breaking the deadlock
item.itunes:subtitle: On a day Chinese President Xi Jinping kicked off his threeday visit to the country the Chinese army reportedly made a fresh incursion in Chumar area and refused to return even as a flagmeeting between the two sides is believed to have made no headway in b
item.itunes:summary: On a day Chinese President Xi Jinping kicked off his threeday visit to the country the Chinese army reportedly made a fresh incursion in Chumar area and refused to return even as a flagmeeting between the two sides is believed to have made no headway in breaking the deadlock

item.title: Gujarat turns prime hunting ground for PMO other depts
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is busy building his team of civil servants in Delhi And it has a strong Gujarat connection Two more Gujarat cadre IAS officers were appointed to the Centre this week amid signs that the next few rounds of bureaucratic reshuffle would see an influx of civil servants from Modis home state
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is busy building his team of civil servants in Delhi And it has a strong Gujarat connection Two more Gujarat cadre IAS officers were appointed to the Centre this week amid signs that the next few rounds of bureaucratic reshuff
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is busy building his team of civil servants in Delhi And it has a strong Gujarat connection Two more Gujarat cadre IAS officers were appointed to the Centre this week amid signs that the next few rounds of bureaucratic reshuffle would see an influx of civil servants from Modis home state

item.title: Isro and Nasa plan Mars joint working group
item.description: Scientists of Indian Space Research Organisation and Nasa plan to set up a Mars joint working groupnbspMeanwhile Isro scientists on Tuesday completed the verifications and the reverifications of the commands that have been uploaded on Mangalyaan
item.itunes:subtitle: Scientists of Indian Space Research Organisation and Nasa plan to set up a Mars joint working groupnbspMeanwhile Isro scientists on Tuesday completed the verifications and the reverifications of the commands that have been uploaded on Mangalyaan
item.itunes:summary: Scientists of Indian Space Research Organisation and Nasa plan to set up a Mars joint working groupnbspMeanwhile Isro scientists on Tuesday completed the verifications and the reverifications of the commands that have been uploaded on Mangalyaan

item.title: Gujarat China ink three pacts
item.description: Gujarat government on Wednesday inked three pacts two agreements and one memorandum of understanding MoU with Chinese agencies in the presence of visiting Chinese President Xi Jinping and Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Ahmedabad
item.itunes:subtitle: Gujarat government on Wednesday inked three pacts two agreements and one memorandum of understanding MoU with Chinese agencies in the presence of visiting Chinese President Xi Jinping and Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Ahmedabad
item.itunes:summary: Gujarat government on Wednesday inked three pacts two agreements and one memorandum of understanding MoU with Chinese agencies in the presence of visiting Chinese President Xi Jinping and Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Ahmedabad

item.title: Chinese President first lady treated to Gujarati thali
item.description: From dhokla to undhiyu and khichdi some 20 Gujarati delicacies were on platter at the dinner organised for visiting Chinese President Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan at Ahmedabad on Wednesday evening
item.itunes:subtitle: From dhokla to undhiyu and khichdi some 20 Gujarati delicacies were on platter at the dinner organised for visiting Chinese President Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan at Ahmedabad on Wednesday evening
item.itunes:summary: From dhokla to undhiyu and khichdi some 20 Gujarati delicacies were on platter at the dinner organised for visiting Chinese President Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan at Ahmedabad on Wednesday evening

item.title: Congress releases booklet on 100 days of BJP misrule
item.description: Congress on Wednesday brought out a booklet on BJPs 100 days of misrule insisting that results of all the bypolls after the Lok Sabha election reflect peoples anger over hollow promises of a useless government
item.itunes:subtitle: Congress on Wednesday brought out a booklet on BJPs 100 days of misrule insisting that results of all the bypolls after the Lok Sabha election reflect peoples anger over hollow promises of a useless government
item.itunes:summary: Congress on Wednesday brought out a booklet on BJPs 100 days of misrule insisting that results of all the bypolls after the Lok Sabha election reflect peoples anger over hollow promises of a useless government
